data.title: Wonderful!
data.text: Great place and awesome food!  20 thumbs up for this fun place!  The staff were great and I wouldn't hesitate to go back!

owner_response.author: Diane H, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Service!
data.text: After a long day we stopped in for dinner.  We ordered salads and a pizza  from a very friendly waitress.  The salads were delivered promptly and were delicious.  When the pizza arrived it looked delicious...a Mighty Meaty!, but when we dug in we found out it was not cooked all the way...raw dough!  The waitress apologized, got the pizza recooked and it was perfect.  Then she had the manager take the pizza off the ticket!  Totally unexpected and unnecessary, but she insisted.  We were impressed with the service and ultimately the meal as well.

owner_response.author: Diane H, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We are soooo sorry your Mighty Meaty was less than perfect!  That is what we strive for!  So glad the manager took care of it for you and hope to see you back in soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good pizza
data.text: I love Mellow Mushroom pizza.  My favorites are the white sauce versions.  They have a good selection of draft beers. The Decatur restaurant tends to be a bit slow compared to others.

owner_response.author: Diane H, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: So glad you are a Mellow fan!  I am sorry your service was slower than you expected.  In the future ask for the manager on duty if it is anything less than your expectations!  We want your visit to be absolutely perfect!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good Pizza
data.text: I love the pizza at mellow mushroom but, it is very pricey.  Service is ok but, the manager resolved the issue.

owner_response.author: Cole S, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Leslie - we agree it's good PIZZA!	We also believe our prices are comparable to other sit down family-style restaurants, as our pizza is very filling, as is our other menu items.   We appreciate your business and will ALWAYS resolve any issues you might have.  Come back and see us soon!  Mark and Diane Holman
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Awful service
data.text: The food was great let me start there but the customer service was the worst iv ever experienced. First off we came in the door and there was no host or hostess. After 15 min of waiting one finally came. Then our waitress came to the table 10 min later. She asked our drinks and it took about 16 min to finally get our drinks. She stood around and talked to other employees till she realized we had no drinks. Then she took our order and by then we were starving. This will be the last time I ever eat there again and the sad thing is that we are regulars.

owner_response.author: Cole S, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Would you please contact me and let me send you back in on us!  I am so sorry you had this experience and want to earn your trust again.  Please......

Mark and Diane Holman
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Pizza
data.text: Great pizza and wait staff.  Due to being part of a large party, we ended playing musical chairs and tables. The wait staff kept their sense of humor through out our meal..  I highly recommend Mellow Mushroom..

owner_response.author: Cole S, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Anna - thanks for the love!  Come back soon!

Mark and Diane Holman
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good Pizza!
data.text: We had dinner there while in town. We had the Mediterranean pizza. Very tasty. The crust was good too. I would just suggest to be a bit more generous on the toppings.

owner_response.author: Cole S, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review

Thanks for sharing your tasty experience.  We appreciate your feedback!

Mark and Diane Holman

data.text: Food was great as always. Service a bit slow but worth the wait. Awesome selection of local brewery beers!

data.text: haven't gotten around to reviewing this, but this location of mellow mushroom is excellent. Great food, quick service.

data.title: Quick lunch
data.text: Loved the Capri it was an appetizer but plenty for a meal. Kids meal pizza was gross we got the mac and cheese which was way better. Overall good experience.

owner_response.author: Diane H, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Glad you came in!  Hope you come back soon....Diane Holman
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Very fun and friendly!
data.text: On a trip to Florida,  my family stopped in Decatur to spend the night.  We picked the Mellow Mushroom for dinner due to the reviews I saw and it looked more fun for the kids.   (I must mention that Vittone's was recommended for the pizza)  The little area the restaurant is in  looks like a very trendy, busy area.  The restaurant is a chain we had never heard of - had a really nice patio area, and very fun and festive inside.  My husband and I noticed it was established in 1974 - seemed like it may have been a "Hippie" place - and now with a similar theme with modern décor.   Our server was very friendly - and the food was served timely.  The one major problem that happened though was that there must have been poor communication in the kitchen as our pizza order was messed up - but they immediately put the corrected pizza in the oven  - and so the problem that happened was that my husband and I were able to eat  - but not the kids.  Luckily we had the appetizer of the spinach and artichoke dish - that they both liked a lot..   So, we ended up with A LOT OF pizza as we got the mistake pizza and the corrected one!!   The pizza was very good - great crust - I could tell the second pizza was likely hurried as the crust was not as good.  I had the greek salad that was very good - the small size was plenty.     I would recommend this place for anyone looking for a casual, fun pizza place.

owner_response.author: Diane H, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Sure hope you stop back by when traveling again!   Diane Holman
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Really poor service.
data.text: Went after a soccer game with some of the team. The service was very slow and took over 20 minutes just to get our drinks. We're still waiting on food. It's been over 45 minutes now. Bad decision coming here.

owner_response.author: Diane H, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Daniel,  So sorry your drinks and food took a while.  We love when soccer comes to town and sometimes we get busy all at once, but I assure you we do our best to accommodate every single customer!  We hope you choose to come back!  Diane
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Oh so yummy
data.text: This is my favorite pizza place to eat. We have one here in Carmel Indiana but it isn't as good. This pizza is so good. My family is from the area and every time we come to visit we eat there at least 1-3 times. The atmosphere is great! They have outside seating which is wonderful in the summer.

owner_response.author: Diane H, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Tammy,  

We are honored that you consider Mellow Mushroom Decatur Alabama your home-away-from-home!  Look forward to seeing you next time!  Diane
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good Food, Fun
data.text: This is a cool, laid back pizza place that offers great Brews, Fun and laid back atmosphere. I have only visited here twice but both times the pizza was awesome, great service.

owner_response.author: Diane H, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for the love Josh!  Diane
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Fun Atmosphere, Local Brews, Good Pizza
data.text: Great family place, service can be slow at times, pizza is usually good, occasionally we get a soggy crust, most times it is really, really good. Do not miss out on the best thing on the menu, the Pretzels with Beer Cheese, these are always excellent, the pretzels are hot and crispy, the Beer Cheese dip is the best I have ever tasted, well worth the carb binge. If you are a fan of local beer, the Truck Stop Honey is the one we like the best.....but they usually have 20 or more varieties, samples are available. Enjoy!

data.title: Awesome Pizza!
data.text: I know there are many places to get a good pizza and Mellow Mushroom is one of them! They have a very robust menu as well as a huge selection of beers to choose from! I'm addition, the atmosphere is comfortably casual with a "hippy" overtone. A fun and satisfying place to get your belly full and socialize! A definite "come-back"!

data.title: Amazing Ambiance
data.text:
When you walk in you know a lot of attention was paid to the mod style decor.  Love it!
We enjoyed a pizza with pineapple and ham, yummy.  Our waitress was friendly and attentive .  We will return.

data.title: Nice location and great pizza
data.text: A very nice representation of the chain, and of course pretty yummy gluten free pizza to go along with the rest of their italian food menu.  The prices are pretty good, and the place was clean with friendly and quick service.

data.title: Really enjoyed
data.text: I was there with my wife and two kids as well as another couple and their children.  We split two large pizzas.  One pizza we had half Maui Wowie half Funky Q.  The other we had half Philosopher Pie half Meaty meats.  They were all excellent.  They are a bit pricey but the pizza is great as well as the atmosphere.  I love that you can split the pizza and do the half/half.  The kids loved it as well and there are TV's everywhere to keep the kiddos entertained.  I will go back again
